text: E saŋiiɓe ɓen ka rewɓe, si wanaa ɓen ɓe jeyruɗon ka ñaame mon. Ɗum ko Farilla Alla e dow mooɗon. Daginanaama on ko woni ɓaawo ɓen ɗon, nde ɗaɓɓitorɓe jawle mon hara ko on saŋiiɓe wanaa on jinndooɓe. Kala mo dakmitorɗon e maɓɓe desal : jonniteeɓe teŋe maɓɓe ɗen. Ko farilla. Bakkaatu fawaaki e fii ko yarlondirɗon e mun ɓaawo farilla on. Pellet, Alla Laatike Annduɗo Ñeeñuɗo
